mapper.select: select sm.menu_permission as "permissions" from sys_menu sm where sm.menu_permission is not null and length(sm.menu_permission) > 0 group by sm.menu_permission

select sm.menu_permission as "permissions" from sys_menu sm join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id where sm.menu_permission is not null and length(sm.menu_permission) > 0 and sur.user_id = #{userId} group by sm.menu_permission
select rm.menu_id from sys_role_menu rm join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id and ur.user_id = 2 where 1 = 1 group by rm.menu_id

select sm.menu_id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_code, sm.menu_name, sm.menu_name_en, sm.menu_permission, sm.menu_index, sm.menu_url, sm.menu_icon from sys_menu sm where parent_id = #{parentId} order by menu_index
